item.title: Primavera P6 Complete Course of Project Planning 2021
item.description: Project Management is not complete without a reliable and strong programing tools to develop project plan, logically linking activities, resource loading, project monitoring and reporting. The strong reliable partner in Planning Software widely used in the world presently is Primavera p6 from oracle. This planning software is widely used across industries from manufacturing, defense, shipping, oil and gas, construction and software development projects. The course aims to disseminate practical application of Primavera P6 for aspiring project manager, planners, schedulers, project developers and owners.
